name: Christmas Solitaire Sage
description:
Christmas Solitaire Sage has 4 game modes:

- Single Deck
- Double Deck
- Fifteens - Single Deck
- Fifteens - Double Deck

Your goal is to earn more points and try to clear all of the cards (Perfect Game) by making combo hands follow the conventions:

- Straight Flush (5 Straight and Flush)
- 4 of A Kind (4 cards with same value)
- Flush (5 cards with same suit)
- Full House (3 Of A Kind and a Pair)
- 5 Straight (5 straight cards)
- 3 Of A Kind (3 cards with same suit)
- 3 Straight (3 straight cards)
- Pair (2 cards with same suit)
- Trash (trash 1 card)
- Double Points (Star card gives double points)
- Fifteen

* Fifteen is only in Fifteens Mode for anything that adds up to 15. Take the value of J,Q,K as 10.

------

* Game Center with 4 ranking.
* Intelligent Hint function simplifies the operations.
* Use the Trashes rationally can help you get Perfect Game easier.
